front.title: Memorandum for multi-domain Public Key Infrastructure Interoperability

abstract.t: The objective of this document is to establish a standard terminology for interoperability of multi-domain Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), where each PKI Domain is operated under a distinct policy. This document describes the relationships between Certification Authorities (CAs), provides the definition and requirements for PKI Domains, and discusses typical models of multi-domain PKI.
